Sentencas: The performance of biogas-fed solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) systems utilizing different reforming agents (steam, air and combined air/steam) has been investigated via thermodynamic analysis to determine the most suitable feed.
Titulo: Selection of appropriate fuel processor for biogas-fuelled SOFC system

Sentencas: The boundary of carbon formation was first calculated to specify the minimum amount of each reforming agent necessary to avoid carbon formation.
Titulo: Selection of appropriate fuel processor for biogas-fuelled SOFC system

Sentencas: The SOFC performance (electrical efficiency and power density) was determined at different biogas compositions and reforming agent:biogas ratios.
Titulo: Selection of appropriate fuel processor for biogas-fuelled SOFC system

Sentencas: The SOFC performance is better when the methane content in the biogas is higher.
Titulo: Selection of appropriate fuel processor for biogas-fuelled SOFC system

Sentencas: Steam is considered to be the most suitable reforming agent in this study as the steam-fed SOFC offers much higher power density than the air-fed SOFC although its electrical efficiency is slightly lower.
Titulo: Selection of appropriate fuel processor for biogas-fuelled SOFC system

Sentencas: When steam is added in thud air-fed SOFC as in the case of the co-fed SOFC, the power density can be improved but the electrical efficiency becomes lower compared with the case of the air-fed SOFC.
Titulo: Selection of appropriate fuel processor for biogas-fuelled SOFC system

Sentencas: Finally, in order to improve the electrical efficiency of the steam-fed SOFC, the biogas split option was proposed.
Titulo: Selection of appropriate fuel processor for biogas-fuelled SOFC system

Sentencas: It was found that a higher electrical efficiency can be achieved.
Titulo: Selection of appropriate fuel processor for biogas-fuelled SOFC system

Sentencas: In addition, although the power density is lowered by this operation, the value is still higher than the case of the air-fed SOFC.
Titulo: Selection of appropriate fuel processor for biogas-fuelled SOFC system
